title: Patient Care Practical Competency Enhancement: Online English Learning Website Utilizing Developmental Teaching Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary English knowledge and foundational understanding of professional (medical/legal/technical) terminology
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners enhance step-by-step English communication skills from beginner to intermediate levels through developmentally appropriate instructional materials.
Learners apply English terminology or expressions related to professional fields (medical/legal/technical) in practical projects.

Learners can develop three or more self-directed learning strategies (e.g., weekly learning plans, peer feedback utilization, self-assessment checklists) using scaffolding features (learning guides, step-by-step feedback) on graduate-level online platforms (e.g., LMS, medical education sites) and apply them to over 80% of learning activities during a 6-month course.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
